definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to cut off (a length)/to stop/to intercept/section/chunk/length

sentences.english: Each new combination of cable and attachment configuration shall be cross sectioned using this procedure.
sentences.chinese: 每個新的組合電纜和附屬裝置都應該通過此程序橫截。

sentences.english: It is proved that the collection of partial transversals of ■ forms a linking system.
sentences.chinese: 證明了■之所有部分橫截的集合形成聯繫系統。

sentences.english: Naturally the five evil paths are closed forever to him.
sentences.chinese: 橫截於五趣，惡道自閉塞。
